title: Best of the Program | 2/16/22
description:
Glenn reiterates the Great Reset's intent for you to own nothing and discusses all the various breaking stories and how they're all connected to the Great Reset. The gun manufacturing company Remington was sued by families of Sandy Hook victims, and insurers opted for a massive settlement.
